item.minecraft.gold_nugget: Ouch! I better put that back!
I found a nugget! Where did it come from?
Is this a treasure or just a snack?
I hope this isn't a tooth!
Gold! I can finally buy... I do not think this is worth anything.
This must be a sign of good luck!
I wonder if I can trade this for something better...
I should probably wash this before I eat it.
A nugget of gold? I’m feeling fancy!
item.minecraft.rotten_flesh: No wonder my Mom told me to floss...
My dentist would be truly disappointed.
This smells worse than I thought!
I hope this isn't what I think it is...
I should really clean my teeth more often.
I can’t believe I found this in my mouth!
item.minecraft.bone: I need to chew harder next time...
Good thing I didn't swallow that!
Did I just find a dinosaur bone?
I hope this isn't a sign of bad dental hygiene.
I should probably see a dentist after this.
What kind of meal was I having?
How did it fit inside me?
I should at least buy a mouthwash or something...
